detectors.description:
VK.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#37-46) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#39)
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#40)
detectors.markdown:
[VK.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#L37-L46) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- [balances[msg.sender] -= value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#L39)
	- [balances[to] += value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#L40)

elements.name: balances[from] >= value && allowed[from][msg.sender] >= value && value > 0 && balances[from] > (balances[to] * 10)

detectors.description:
VK.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#49-60) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balances[from] >= value && allowed[from][msg.sender] >= value && value > 0 && balances[from] > (balances[to] * 10) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#50)
	- balances[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#51)
	- balances[from] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#52)
	- allowed[from][msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#53)
detectors.markdown:
[VK.transferFrom(address,address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#L49-L60) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- [balances[from] >= value && allowed[from][msg.sender] >= value && value > 0 && balances[from] > (balances[to] * 10)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#L50)
	- [balances[to] += value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#L51)
	- [balances[from] -= value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#L52)
	- [allowed[from][msg.sender] -= value](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#L53)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- VK.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#23-25)
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#4)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- VK.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#29-31)
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#5)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#6)
	- VK.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#33-35)

transferFrom(address,address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#7)
	- VK.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#49-60)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#8)
	- VK.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#62-66)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#9)
	- VK.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/VK__1.sol#37-46)
